async_info.video_title: General election 2019: The voting system explained - BBC News
async_info.video_description:
The UK election date is set for 12 December 2019. But how does voting in a general election actually work?
Motion graphics by Jacqueline Galvin
Produced by Sarah Glatte
Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

comment_content.original_script:
The local Tory knocked on my door... I shouted FASCIST at him until he went away.
The local Labour knocked on my door..... I shouted MARXIST at him until he went away.
The local Lib Un-Dem knocked on my door... I shouted DEMOCRATIC TRAITOR until she went away.
The local Brexit knocked on my door... I shouted DO ME A FAVOUR MATE until he went away.
I walked to the bottom of my drive and shouted I HAVE NO ONE TO VOTE FOR!!!!
